english: Buoyancy decides whether a solid object floats or sinks .
chinese: 浮力决定固体物体的沉浮。

english: The buoyant effect of the thin-walled bell may be neglected in most cases .
chinese: 薄壁钟本身的浮力影响通常可以忽略不计。

english: That is, the reading of the spring scale has been increased by an amount equal to the buoyant force .
chinese: 这时弹簧秤称得的数值增加到和浮力相等的量。

english: In addition to the wetting force, any significant immersion of the fiber in the liquid will induce a buoyancy force .
chinese: 在润湿力之外，纤维实际浸渍在液体中时，还要产生一种浮力。

english: The upward buoyant force on an object partially or wholly submerged in a fluid is equal to the weight of the displaced fluid .
chinese: 物体的一部分或全部浸在液体中时，它受到朝上的浮力等于它排开的液体重量。
浮力造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The upward buoyant force on an object partially or wholly submerged in a fluid is equal to the weight of the displaced fluid .
chinese: 部分浸没或全部浸没在流体中的物体所受到的向上浮力，等于它所排开流体的重量。

english: The raft will be more buoyant if it is less heavy
chinese: 木筏若轻一点，浮力就更大了。

english: Test method for density of glass by buoyancy
chinese: 用浮力法测定玻璃密度的试验方法

english: The raft was buoyed up by empty petrol cans
chinese: 这木筏依靠空汽油桶的浮力漂浮。

english: Did you bring your fioaties ? - it ' s all i could find
chinese: 你没带你的浮力板? -就能找到这个

english: Analysis of research method on submarine reserve buoyancy
chinese: 潜艇储备浮力论证研究方法分析

english: Consider neutral buoyancy your most valuable technique
chinese: 把中性浮力看作你最宝贵的技巧。

english: - did you bring your fioaties ? - it ' s all i could find
chinese: -你没带你的浮力板? -就能找到这个

english: The quantitative calculation of a buoyancy cause experiment
chinese: 一个浮力成因实验的定量计算

english: What is that ? - this is my flotation device
chinese: 那是什么?这是我的浮力装置
